sentences.en: A cabal of Appalachian district directors will undertake a palace revolution.
sentences.cn: 阿巴拉契山脉地区的一小撮头面人物正企图谋反.

sentences.en: And those aspens have those gold leaves in the Appalachian Trail in the fall.
sentences.cn: 并且那些白杨木有那些金叶子在阿巴拉契亚足迹在秋天.

sentences.en: I was born in Burdine, Kentucky, in the heart of the Appalachian coal - mining country.
sentences.cn: 我出生在阿帕拉契山脉煤矿区中心的肯塔基州柏定市.

sentences.en: More than half of Appalachian coal mining is done by the wrenching mountaintop removal method.
sentences.cn: 阿帕拉契山脉一半多煤矿都采用山巅移除采矿的方法.

sentences.en: The deposits is very similar to the Mississippi Valley Type deposits in Appalachian and Missouri, USA.
sentences.cn: 矿床成因属密西西比河谷型(MVT),其地质特点可与北美Appalachia地区和Missouri地区的MVT矿床对比.

sentences.en: The state , with its Appalachian Mountains, is the highest in elevation east of the Mississippi.
sentences.cn: 本州因为有阿帕拉契山脉通过, 乃是密西西比河以东海拔最高的地方.

phrases.tran_cn: 阿巴拉契亚山道；阿帕拉契山径
